Reviews.Title: me enviaron un celular reconstruido
Reviews.Author: Rosana M. Garcia Orta "rosia"
Reviews.Content: me enviaron unn celular reconstruido, y eso me pague por uno nuevo, aparte vino con problemas del flash, al colocarle la bateria se enciende la luz del flash, he enviado a u servicio tecnico paras que me lo arregle y todavia no han podido, la tarjeta del telefono esta oxidada, no me vino con la tarjetas de 8Gb que describe, en fin, estoy muy molesta por ello.

Reviews.Title: This is a T-mobile version of Blackberry 9780
Reviews.Author: NewYorker
Reviews.Content: I was actually surprised when I had this phone because they did not mention that it is T-mobile phone. The box was opened and used previously but it seems clean. It was a gift and I will try this phone outside in US. I really wonder it will work or not. The title of this should be T-mobile version. What I would say, it is not really fresh.

Reviews.Title: What a surprise I have been
Reviews.Author: lmalave
Reviews.Content: When you get the phone to your destination in Venezuela, I was surprised that it is T-mobile version and therefore does not work that compoania 3G in my country, ie not the phone work for me here. I have to sell

Reviews.Title: exelente
Reviews.Author: freddy riveros
Reviews.Content: el producto llego rápido al destino, excelente servicio; agradecido buena puntuación,  sin mas que decir y una prointa nueva compra

Reviews.Title: Telefono Repotenciado(Reconstruido)
Reviews.Author: Richard
Reviews.Content: Una recomendacion buena ES Q SIGAN BUSCANDO Y COMPREN EN OTRO Y NO A ESTE VENDEDOR, LO DIGO PORQ me enviaron unn celular reconstruido,a pesar que pague el producto como nuevo, el teclado vino defectuoso, la tecla tactil en mal estado(trackpack)tuve que enviarlo a arreglar xq m vino malo practicamente y tuve q pagar casi 900 mil bs, la memoria d 8Gb no m la trajo y estaba la placa d telefono x dentro deterioradada, ADICIONAL TAMPOCO ESTA LIBERADO(NO TIENE LAS BANDAS ABIERTAS)... MALISIMO EL PRODUCTO Y ENOJADO POR ESO.!!!

Reviews.Title: No me gusto la compra
Reviews.Author: Gerardo Galaviz
Reviews.Content: fue muy buena la compra apesar que pedi los telefonos blancos y me los enviaron negros, y los telefonos no levantan 3Gwas very good buying phones eventhough I ordered white and black sent to me, and do not lift 3G phones

Reviews.Title: Good Product
Reviews.Author: J.Mai
Reviews.Content: It came new and worked perfectly. Its relatively cheap and there has been no problems with the phone so far. Great phone for texting and calling.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Dante
Reviews.Content: Great phone, the back feel is great apart from getting dirty easily. Needed to be a different material in order to prevent discoloration on the back.

Reviews.Title: Nice Phone
Reviews.Author: Miguel Nuñez
Reviews.Content: bougth if your my wife she loves it, fast, has BBM that is what she wanted 5mp camera, and has space for aplications installing

Reviews.Title: Fantastic!!
Reviews.Author: Mickey
Reviews.Content: Excellent!! Everything worked perfect!! The phone was perfect condition and came with charge and looked new. I'm extremely happy with the purchase

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Alex Falcon
Reviews.Content: I recomend this buyer it is quick and responsable and the thing a bought it is as expected buy a recomend them

Reviews.Title: muy bueno
Reviews.Author: Jean
Reviews.Content: el articulo llego tal cual el anuncio del vendedor, el envio fue rapido lo recomiendo muy bueno. excelente producto. gracias

Reviews.Title: excenete
Reviews.Author: eduard
Reviews.Content: producto muy bueno totalmente nuevo con gran funcionabilidad software perfecto embalaje perfecto camara muy buena para realizar tomas nocturnas a distancia considerada

Reviews.Title: blackberry
Reviews.Author: xin
Reviews.Content: It is a gift for my friend, that why i don't know how to rate it, but it looks pretty, and the saler is nice to give us the phone case.

Reviews.Title: Dissatisfied Customer!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This "brand new" phone, as described in the description, came with a faulty keypad, I have yet to see the 8GB memory chip that was to be included. LCD went bad after one week use and no falls. I contacted them and they were willing to replace the keypad, however, I would have had to internationally ship the phone back for it to be fixed. Because the picture I sent of the damaged LCD indicated that the phone fell the labor would be free but not the parts! If you are ordering for international use do not use Wireovia because you will have problems and the cost will be on you to get them fixed!

Reviews.Title: wonderful service
Reviews.Author: blessedforever
Reviews.Content: I ordered this phone online on the 23rd july and although the "delivery estimate" was august 16th, I received the phone within one week. I am very impressed with the excellent customer service and on/before time performance. My son loves the product and everyone is 100% satisfied - the phone is a lot ccheaper than the store brought phone and of the same high quality and standard.sincerely,blessedforever

Reviews.Title: Very Good
Reviews.Author: Guilherme AM Vieira
Reviews.Content: Works OK!! I received in rigth date and the correct product!! The cell phone is really new!! Great seller, and good service.
